025package com.github.siroshun09.event4j.subscriber;
026
027import com.github.siroshun09.event4j.listener.ListenerFactory;
028import com.github.siroshun09.event4j.listener.ListenerBase;
029import com.github.siroshun09.event4j.listener.SubscribedListener;
030import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
031import org.jetbrains.annotations.Nullable;
032import org.jetbrains.annotations.Unmodifiable;
033
034import java.util.Collection;
035import java.util.List;
036import java.util.function.Consumer;
037import java.util.function.Predicate;
038
039/**
040 * An interface to manage listeners.
041 *
042 * @param <K> the key type
043 * @param <E> the event type
044 * @param <O> the order type
045 */
046public interface EventSubscriber<K, E, O> {
047
048    /**
049     * Gets the event class of this {@link EventSubscriber}.
050     *
051     * @return the event class of this {@link EventSubscriber}
052     */
053    @NotNull Class<E> eventClass();
054
055    /**
056     * Creates a new {@link ListenerFactory}.
057     *
058     * @return a new {@link ListenerFactory}
059     */
060    @NotNull ListenerFactory<K, E, O> listenerFactory();
061
062    /**
063     * Subscribes a new listener.
064     *
065     * @param key      the key
066     * @param consumer the {@link Consumer}
067     * @return a {@link SubscribedListener}
068     * @see #subscribe(Object, Consumer, Object)
069     */
070    default @NotNull SubscribedListener<K, E, O> subscribe(@NotNull K key, @NotNull Consumer<? super E> consumer) {
071        return this.subscribe(key, consumer, null);
072    }
073
074    /**
075     * Subscribes a new listener from {@link ListenerBase}.
076     *
077     * @param listener the {@link ListenerBase}
078     * @return a {@link SubscribedListener}
079     * @see #subscribe(Object, Consumer, Object)
080     */
081    default @NotNull SubscribedListener<K, E, O> subscribe(@NotNull ListenerBase<K, E, O> listener) {
082        return this.subscribe(listener.key(), listener.consumer(), listener.order());
083    }
084
085    /**
086     * Subscribes a new listener.
087     * <p>
088     * The key is only used for {@link #unsubscribeByKey(Object)}. Same keys can be passed to this method for subscribing multiple listeners.
089     *
090     * @param key      the key
091     * @param consumer the {@link Consumer}
092     * @param order    the order
093     * @return a {@link SubscribedListener}
094     */
095    @NotNull SubscribedListener<K, E, O> subscribe(@NotNull K key, @NotNull Consumer<? super E> consumer, @Nullable O order);
096
097    /**
098     * Subscribes multiple listeners.
099     * <p>
100     * If you want to subscribe multiple listeners,
101     * this method is better for performance than calling {@link #subscribe(ListenerBase)} one by one.
102     *
103     * @param listeners the listeners to subscribe
104     * @return {@link SubscribedListener}s
105     */
106    @NotNull @Unmodifiable Collection<SubscribedListener<K, E, O>> subscribeAll(@NotNull Iterable<ListenerBase<K, E, O>> listeners);
107
108    /**
109     * Unsubscribes the specified {@link SubscribedListener}.
110     *
111     * @param subscribedListener the {@link SubscribedListener} to unsubscribe
112     * @return if the listener has been unsubscribed, returns {@code true}, otherwise {@code false}
113     * @throws IllegalStateException if this subscriber is already closed
114     */
115    boolean unsubscribe(@NotNull SubscribedListener<K, E, O> subscribedListener);
116
117    /**
118     * Unsubscribes the specified {@link SubscribedListener}s.
119     *
120     * @param subscribedListeners the {@link SubscribedListener}s to unsubscribe
121     * @return {@code true} if at least one listener is unsubscribed, otherwise {@code false}
122     */
123    boolean unsubscribeAll(@NotNull Collection<? extends SubscribedListener<K, E, O>> subscribedListeners);
124
125    /**
126     * Unsubscribes listeners by the specified key.
127     *
128     * @param key the key
129     * @return {@code true} if at least one listener is unsubscribed, otherwise {@code false}
130     */
131    boolean unsubscribeByKey(@NotNull K key);
132
133    /**
134     * Unsubscribes all listeners that satisfy the given {@link Predicate}.
135     *
136     * @param predicate a predicate which returns true for listeners to be unsubscribed
137     * @return {@code true} if at least one listener is unsubscribed, otherwise {@code false}
138     */
139    boolean unsubscribeIf(@NotNull Predicate<? super SubscribedListener<K, E, O>> predicate);
140
141    /**
142     * Gets the list of subscribed listeners.
143     *
144     * @return the list of subscribed listeners.
145     */
146    @NotNull @Unmodifiable List<? extends SubscribedListener<K, E, O>> getSubscribedListeners();
147
148}
